main event: On February 6, 1959, a witness took a photograph near Boulder, Colorado, which later revealed a blob-like object identified as a UFO.
interesting points: The object was described as a white, luminous, roughly spherical, typical flying saucer., The witness initially did not realize the object was in the photograph until further examination confirmed its presence., Civilian saucer investigators sent the photograph to NICAP for evaluation., Dr. Menzel suggested the blob might be a reflection from a window on the Law Building., The photograph was taken at approximately 5:00 p.m. on Flagstaff Mountain.
sighted object: a white, luminous, roughly spherical object
witness description: The witness spent the afternoon climbing and took a picture of the town of Boulder.
